value:
We've got to defeat all of the Heroes
that we can if it frees them from
being forced to serve.

I work for Lady Elise. My job is to be
a wall between her and enemies.
So I bulk up—as much as I can.

You're always working. If you need
my strength, know that I can crush
rocks to dust with my bare hands!

Takes a lot of food to keep me bulky
enough to be a good wall. So we
should hit all the feasts we can.

I keep stones in my armor to weigh
me down. That way, I can train even
when I'm just standing around.

Going around in armor makes a girl
hungry. Worth it to deliver a hello
from $Nf.
I feel like I could take on anyone!
Strict training is the trick!

I'll have to work even harder
tomorrow.

Thanks. Every brick makes me a
better wall.

The name's Effie. I'm a knight from
Nohr. Need protection? I'll crush
anyone that gets in your way.

*munch munch* Tasty... Oh, hey,
$Nu!
Is it snack time for you, too?$k$pYou brought me a sandwich?
Thanks! Nice of you to hand-
deliver it and everything!$k$pI've been eating even more since
I got here. Got to be ready to
protect Lady Elise and...$k$pyou know...protect you as well.$k$pI need to eat a lot and train even
more so I can be the shield that
keeps you safe.$k$pThanks again for the sandwich.
*munch munch* That was great—
packed with kindness.
せいっ！
でりゃあ！
ううっ！
I've been outdone?!
No more holding back!
Time to say good-bye.
Coming through!
I'll crush you to dust!
My training...
Heehee
Takes a lot of bricks to make this wall. That means training, food, and lots of both.
One, two, three—! Heh. Always training. Always counting.
Fish or fowl? Either one's just fine. Long as I get a pile on my plate.
Need any boulders moved? No problem for me.
Quite a weapon you've got there. Afraid I'd break it if I touched it.
Where's Lady Elise? She and I like to grab snacks when we can.
You leave the heavy stuff to me. I'd lift a cow for you, friend.
Hmm?
Let's go.
Who to crush?
